external_games.name: TYRONE SOULZ: Bitch Ass Pussy Mode

name: Tyrone Soulz: Bitch Ass Pussy Mode
summary: Show Tyrone who's boss with this DLC (Difficulty Lowering Compromise), a modification to TYRONE SOULZ that caters specifically to those who struggle to rise to the occasion. The powerful Tyrone will be neutered in various ways, making him easier, but less satisfying, to defeat.
